name: Fat&Mad
description:
MOVE TO THE RIGHT AS FAST AS POSSIBLE ! FOLLOW THE WHITE BOXES!

Collect the GREEN  boxes to lower your hunger, so you don't die.

AVOID the RED boxes because you loose health !

WATCH your fuel. It doesn't last long the fatter you get !

CONTROLS:

-arrow key or WASD to move character

Your a fat guy who can fly like having an jetpack. You need to get to the end before you die of hunger.On your way there you can eat some humburgers but they will make you fatter and the jetpack isn´t going any faster.

This was my first time. It was fun but did't had a lot of time and starting twice from scratch doesn´t help eiter. 
I hope that i will do better for LD41 .We all do...
